Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that will give engineer&pilot&scientist abilities to every kerbal (ideally while still have different costume with texture replacer)? Like in previous versions of KSP - stick any kerbal and go do everything in career.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-18T08:43:27Z" title="05/18/2015 08:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 18, 2015</time> by gendalf**
